Get contact by id :type owner_id: int :param owner_id: User who created contact :type owner_id: int :type contact_id: int :param contact_id: Contact id :type contact_id: int :return: Contact from query :rtype: Contact | None

async get_contacts(owner_id, offset, limit)[source]¶

Get list of contacts :type owner_id: int :param owner_id: User who created contacts :type owner_id: int :type offset: int :param offset: The number of contacts to skip :type offset: int :type limit: int :param limit: The max number of contacts to return :type limit: int :return: Contacts from query :rtype: List[Contact]

async get_upcoming_birthdays(owner_id)[source]¶

Selects list of contacts who’s upcoming birthdays within 7 days :type owner_id: :param owner_id: User who created contacts :type owner_id: int :return: List of contacts :rtype: List[Contact]

async remove_contact(owner_id, contact_id)[source]¶

Remove contact :type owner_id: :param owner_id: User who created contact :type owner_id: int :type contact_id: int :param contact_id: Id of contact to remove :type contact_id: int :return: Removed contact :rtype: Contact | None

async search_contacts(owner_id, param)[source]¶

Search contacts by first name or last name or email :type owner_id: :param owner_id: User who created contacts :type owner_id: int :type param: str :param param: First name or last name or email to search by :type param: str :return: Contacts from query :rtype: List[Contact]

async update_contact(owner_id, contact_id, new_contact)[source]¶

REST API routes Auth¶

User authentication :type form_data: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm :param form_data: User credentials :type form_data: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm :type db: AsyncSession :param db: The database session :type db: Session :return: Token: authentication (login) token, refresh token :rtype: str

async src.auth.routes.refresh_tokens(refresh_token, db=Depends(get_db))[source]¶

Refresh login token :type refresh_token: str :param refresh_token: Token form login request to refresh login token :type refresh_token: str :type db: AsyncSession :param db: The database session :type db: Session :return: Token: New authentication (login) token, new refresh token :rtype: str

async src.auth.routes.register(user_create, background_tasks, request, db=Depends(get_db))[source]¶

Register new user :type user_create: UserCreate :param user_create: New user to register :type user_create: UserCreate :type background_tasks: BackgroundTasks :param background_tasks: Send verification email :type background_tasks: BackgroundTasks :type request: Request :param request: Gets base url to create verification link :type request: Request :type db: AsyncSession :param db: The database session :type db: Session :return: Registered user :rtype: UserResponse

async src.auth.routes.verify_email(token, db=Depends(get_db))[source]¶

Verify user email :type token: str :param token: token wich verified user email and set it as active :type token: str :type db: AsyncSession :param db: The database session :type db: Session :return: Success message :rtype: str

REST API routes Auth¶

src.auth.utils.create_access_token(data)[source]¶

Create token to get access :type data: dict :param data: Username (email) :type data: dict :return: Encoded jwt token :rtype: str

src.auth.utils.create_refresh_token(data)[source]¶

Create refresh token :type data: dict :param data: Username (email) :type data: dict :return: Encoded jwt token :rtype: str

src.auth.utils.create_verification_token(email)[source]¶

Create encoded token for user verification from user email and secret key :type email: EmailStr :param email: User email :type email: EmailStr :return: Encoded jwt token :rtype: str

src.auth.utils.decode_access_token(token)[source]¶

Decode access token :type token: str :param token: Token to decode :type token: str :return: User email from token if exists :rtype: TokenData | None

src.auth.utils.decode_verification_token(token)[source]¶

Decode verification token :type token: str :param token: Token to verify :type token: str :return: User email or None :rtype: str | None

async src.auth.utils.get_current_user(token=Depends(OAuth2PasswordBearer), db=Depends(get_db))[source]¶

REST API routes Passwords¶

src.auth.pass_utils.get_password_hash(password)[source]¶

Hash user password :type password: str :param password: User password in hashed view. :type password: str :return: Hashed password :rtype: str

src.auth.pass_utils.verify_password(plain_password, password_hashed)[source]¶

Verify if user enters password the same as its hashed version in db :type plain_password: str :param plain_password: User password. :type plain_password: str :type password_hashed: str :param password_hashed: Hashed user password :type password_hashed: str :return: If password is valid :rtype: bool
